column4: hey i have a small question, i have two fat partitions on a sata drive, i have included them in fstab to mount to /media/data1 and /media/data2 but when i start my computer up it tries to mount them but says there are no /dev/sda1 and /dev/sda2
however, if i do mount -a once it's started they mount file
angrod, well you can install windows media player for online streaming using crossover office
